body:
The crux of what, as I understand it, may be our failure to agree -- is the interpretation of "events." As it were, I may indeed agree that the "event" or "events" you've cited as the _Irregular Process_ is accurate. 

But I feel that it represents an incomplete history of a complex set of very many "events" which are left undocumented. This is why I said `conditions and content are insufficient to qualify as an objective representation of affairs`.

Please see https://github.com/ethereumclassic/ECIPs/pull/235 for an approach to providing a nearer-complete justification and availably-objective view of "events," which may be able to satisfy your wish for ["to provide justifications in ECIP-1000 for what has happened in the past."](https://github.com/ethereumclassic/ECIPs/pull/220#issuecomment-560420766)
